alert.note: Alert for Kaufman; Van Zandt (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 05 at 12:16AM CDT until April 05 at 1:15AM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Kaufman County in north central Texas... Western Van Zandt County in north central Texas... * Until 115 AM CDT. * At 1215 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Grays Prairie, or near Kaufman, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Kaufman, Canton, Wills Point, Grand Saline, Mabank, Crandall, Edgewood, Kemp, Fruitvale, Grays Prairie, Cottonwood, Purtis Creek State Park, Oak Grove, Post Oak Bend City, Rosser and Oak Ridge. This includes Interstate 20 between mile markers 504 and 534. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CDT for north central Texas. For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning can kill.
